Class ProtocolParser

java.lang.Object
com.dnikitin.poker.common.protocol.clientserver.ProtocolParser
public class ProtocolParser extends Object
Responsible for parsing raw text-based network messages into typed Command objects.

Protocol Format: The protocol uses a space-delimited format with Key-Value pairs for parameters.
Standard format: GAME_ID PLAYER_ID ACTION [PARAM=VALUE]...
Initial format: ACTION [PARAM=VALUE]... (e.g., HELLO, CREATE, JOIN)

This class implements strict validation to ensure messages conform to size limits and expected formats before they reach the game logic.

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public Command parse(String line)
      Parses a raw protocol string into a specific Command implementation.
      Parameters:
      line - The raw string received from the socket (excluding newline characters).
      Returns:
      A concrete Command object (e.g., BetCommand, JoinCommand).
      Throws:
      ProtocolException - If the message is empty, too large, malformed, or contains unknown commands.
